DataDownload Class Reference

A list of DownloadSegments used to collect chunks of data as they are downloaded from an addProxyData() or addProxyFileData() call. More...

Detailed Description

A list of DownloadSegments used to collect chunks of data as they are downloaded from an addProxyData() or addProxyFileData() call.
